entry.title: Unicorn Spit Zia Teal 4 oz 5770006
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Paint, stain
Price: 7.49

UNICORN SPIT, Zia Teal, 4 oz bottle.

UNICORN SPIT allows anyone to turn ordinary objects into personalized MASTERPIECES!
Use on wood, glass, metal, fabric, pottery, wicker, concrete and laminate. Ideal for creating new - or - refinishing thousands of projects. Excellent for Crafters, Makers, Hobbyists, DIYers and Pros too!

•  PAINT, GEL STAIN and GLAZE in One!
•  14 vibrant colors!
•  Make your project as opaque or vibrant as your dreams require.
   Use as a PAINT or dilute with water to create a GEL, GLAZE, STAIN, WHITE WASH
   or ANTIQUING TINT!
•  Penetrates deep into the bare wood grain or glazes over existing finishes,
   brightens and highlights chalk paint, and provides a 3-D dimensional effect
•  Jasmine scented
•  Use indoors or outdoors

entry.title: Famowood Glaze Coat Epoxy Coating One Gallon Kit 5050110
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eclectic Products
Type: Epoxy Resin, Art Resin
Price: 66.81

FAMOWOOD GLAZE COAT Epoxy Coating One Gallon Kit, 5050110

Kit contains 64 ounces Resin, 64 ounces Hardener.

Coverage  approximately 25.6 square feet

Application Instructions                       

SDS

Ultra Clear, High Gloss Finish.  A two part epoxy used on thousands of projects to achieve a high-gloss finish or where embedding or preservation are desired.  Coat, embed, and preserve Home Decor, Furniture, Jewelry, Craft and many more projects!  Use on wood, metal, rock/masonry, cloth, furniture, leather, pine cones, Styrfoam, seashells, decals, oil paints & more.  The perfect coating for Unicorn Spit.

This ultra-clear, high gloss finishing epoxy is ideal for home improvement and craft projects. FAMOWOOD Glaze Coat is a pour-on epoxy coating that can be used on most surfaces – rough or smooth, stained or painted. It's great for coating tables or bar tops, preserving photographs or imbedding decorative items. Just one coat equals 70 coats of varnish!

• Easy 1:1 mixing ratio
• Versatile – use on any non waxy material
• Self-leveling – minimal spreading required
• Indoor use
• Resists temperatures up to 120 °F

entry.title: EX-74 Epoxy resin for Resin Art Bars Tables 2 Gallon Kit $117.99
entry.summary:
Vendor: Environmental Technology
Type: Epoxy Resin, Art Resin
Price: 117.99

EX-74 Epoxy Coating.  Two Gallon Kit. (One gallon of Resin, One gallon of Hardener).

EX-74 is the preferred product for Resin Art, table tops, bar top, and counter tops.  and artifacts.  EX-74 is the art resin preferred product used by artists to provide a high gloss, glass like finish to their paintings.    EX-74 has been formulated for improved UV resistance to reduce yellowing and surface degradation from UV exposure.

EX-74 is an extremely clear, tough, high gloss surface coating formulated to produce deep glass like appearance in a single layer on a sealed surface. Two or more layers are often applied for added depth and protection. EX-74 has been formulated for improved UV resistance to reduce yellowing and surface degradation from UV exposure. EX-74 has an extended "open time" which allows up to 5 minutes in the mixing container at 70º F and up to one hour working time on the surface being coated. EX-74 is waterproof, heat & alcohol resistant.

Coverage:  Two gallons will cover approximately 64 square feet @ 1/16" inch.

Notice:   For Air Shipments, this product is classified as Hazardous.  Additional HazMat Fees apply.  This fee is in addition to the shipping fee shown at checkout, and will be added to your total .   See Terms and Conditions.  No extra charge for ground shipments
